sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate into the anti - tumor effect of total alkaloids of Radix Sophorae Tonkinensis .

sentences.english: Objective To study the alkaloid structures of stemona japonica Miq.

sentences.english: Neferine (Nef) is a dibenzylisoquinoline alkaloid isolated from a Chinese medicinal herb ( Nelumbo nucifera Gaertn ).

sentences.english: Buprenorphine, a synthetic derivative of Thebaine, is a strong new analgesic agent.

sentences.english: The primary active ingredienn are berberine and hydrastine alkaloids, among others.

sentences.english: A bitter alkaloid poison resembling strychnine and extracted from nux vomica.
